product_name: Banana Boat Kids' Tear Free Sunblock SPF 50 - 8 fl. oz.
long_description: Protect your children from harmful sun rays with no-fuss Kids' Tear Free sunblock from Banana Boat. SPF 50-rated sunblock provides broad spectrum UVA and UVB protection. Water-resistant, hypoallergenic and fragrance-free lotion is pediatrician tested to be as mild as water to children's eyes and skin. Protects for hours; reapply after swimming or towling dry.
short_description: Protect your children from harmful sun rays with no-fuss Kids' Tear Free sunblock from Banana Boat.
